channel.title: Zelda?! Again?!
channel.description: Hey i think the zelda games are great. they are though very long and i have not yet successfully beaten one of the games. (even with a tutorial) i tried beating ocarina of time but my 3 year old brother put it in a sink of water. damn that bastard

item.title: Zelda?! Again?!

item.description:
@bullzeye95 wrote:

Yea and it’s amazing. Though it makes your arm tired after awhile.

item.title: Zelda?! Again?!
item.dc:creator: @Blackester Blackester
item.description:
@Blackester wrote:

[quote=“kaza, post:3, topic:28189”][quote author=FastBallz link=topic=41703.msg508697#msg508697 date=1164283506]
8 Hours into Twilight Princess…Just got out of the First Dungeon…

I must say…

10/10

One of the best games I’ve played…Fun with the boomerang…and bomb things…and rocks…and 8 monkeys…
[/quote]

i didnt even know it was out yet. And for what console lol.

i completed majora’s mask for n64, that pwn3d…but ocarina of time is hard, and myn glitched in the water temple, theres no keys and i cant go any further :S[/quote]

kaza theres a hidden key somewhere i thought mine ws glitched too but keep looking
ive beaten ocarina of time like 50 times

Read full topic
